name: stories_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bb_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query for all information about finance summary, stocks, quotes, movers, etcâ€¦ to create a financial site/application such as bloomberg.com
API description: Retrieves a list of stories related to a specific sticker using the BB Finance API.

template.description: The category of the sticker, which can be one of the following: COMMODITY, CURRENCY, INDEX, INDEXFUTURE, RATE, or STOCK.

is_id.description: The value of the 'id' field returned by the /market/auto-complete endpoint.
